TopicTitle: How do you post a spacecraft file ?

Articles.Content:
i'm new in the forums (not in KSP... i'v been playing for over a year) and i can't figure out how to attach a file in a thread.

any ideas ?

thanks

-Shawn.

Edited May 14, 2015 by Shawn28
Dropbox is used quite a bit. I don't think you can directly attach a file to a thread without some sort of hosting.

Not a problem! Go open yourself an account at DropBox or other such site (it's free). Then you can upload your craft file and post the link to it in your thread. For images, use Imgur or another such site.
Google drive also works, if you prefer it.

Thanks guys ! i would try drop box and maybe google drive.

happy explosions !

-Shawn.

- - - Updated - - -

another quick question: how do you turn this thread to 'Answered' ?
KerbalX.com is a more dedicated solution too.

never mind (about the 'Answered' thing; figured it out).

i would try KerbalX if DropBox doesn't work
